pages.text: Yang release is not a kekki genkai, this means to obtain it you need to learn a jutsu for it. Yang currently has 5 jutsus.

pages.title: Multi-size jutsu
pages.text: Upon using this jutsu the user will grow the user dependant on the amount charged, the user also gains strength and reach dependant on the charge level.$(li)Max charge:10$(li)Max chakra taken:500$(li)Jutsuxp needed:500
